extensionAttribute.description: This attribute displays the current virus definition version.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsWindows: On Error Resume Next Const HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE = &H80000002 strComputer = "." Set oReg=GetObject("winmgmts:{impersonationLevel=impersonate}!\\" & _ strComputer & "\root\default:StdRegProv") strKeyPath = "SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Microsoft Forefront\Client Security\1.0\AM\Signature Updates" strValueName = "AVsignatureVersion" oReg.GetStringValue HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE,strKeyPath,strValueName,strValue Wscript.Echo "<result>" & strValue & "</result>"
